Package com.mirna.customercontactlistapi.domain.services

Interface CustomerService

All Known Implementing Classes:

@Service public interface CustomerService
Customer service interface for managing customer information.

  • Method Details

    • addCustomer

      Customer addCustomer(CustomerDTO customer)
      Adds a new customer to the repository.
      Parameters:
      customerDTO - A data transfer object representing a customer to add.
      Returns:
      The saved customer if successful, or null if there is an error.

    • addCustomer

      Customer addCustomer(Customer customer)
      Adds a new customer to the repository.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer entity to be added.
      Returns:
      The saved customer if successful, or null if there is an error.

    • findCustomerById

      Customer findCustomerById(UUID id) throws EntityNotPresentException
      Searches for a customer by id.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the customer to find.
      Returns:
      The found customer.
      Throws:
      EntityNotPresentException - If there is an error in finding the customer.

      Retrieves a list of all customers.
      Returns:
